SourcedStatement: “Southwest Airlines fully complies with applicable sick leave laws in Oakland and California, as well as with the terms of a December 2020 settlement agreement with the city,”
Name: Southwest Airlines

SourcedStatement: “The City of Oakland is committed to protecting workers by ensuring that all employers in Oakland are complying with laws that protect their rights,”
Name: Barbara Parker
Title: City Attorney

SourcedStatement: “We are grateful that the City of Oakland is holding Southwest accountable. We hope that Southwest policies and practices will finally change for good,”
Name: Eric Swygert
Title: Southwest employee and an elected ramp representative with the Transport Workers Union of America Local 555
Justification: a Southwest employee and an elected ramp representative with the Transport Workers Union of America Local 555
